Content:: Miguel Pérez Villar (6 September 1945 – 20 July 2022) was a Spanish businessman and politician.[1] He served as a member of the Senate of Spain from 1991 to 1993.[2] Villar died in July 2022 in Madrid, at the age of 76.[3]  This business-related Spanish biographical article is a stub.
